spell.spellslabextra.arrow_rain.name: Arrow Rain
spell.spellslabextra.arrow_rain.descript: Unleash a volley of arrows, raining down in an area.
spell.spellslabextra.force_push.name: Force Push
spell.spellslabextra.force_push.descript: Push your target away, making it levitate for an instant.
spell.spellslabextra.holy_rain.name: Holy Rain
spell.spellslabextra.holy_rain.descripti: Call down a rain of Holy energy in an area, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spell.spellslabextra.ice_barrage.name: Ice Barrage
spell.spellslabextra.ice_barrage.descrip: Shoot a barrage of 8 projectiles in a cone, each dealing {damage} frost spell damage. Short range.
spell.spellslabextra.scorching_ground.de: Set the area around you in fire, damaging enemies for {damage} fire spell damage and setting them on fire. Lasts for {cloud_duration} seconds.
spell.spellslabextra.fire_missiles.name: Fire Missiles
spell.spellslabextra.fire_missiles.descr: Shoot a barrage of homing missiles at your enemies, dealing {damage} fire spell damage.
spell.spellslabextra.stone_fist.name: Stone Fist
spell.spellslabextra.stone_fist.descript: Shoot a powerful Stone Fist, dealing {damage_1} physical damage + {damage_2} holy spell damage, and slowing enemies in an area.
